page.title: 05Industry in Viewpark area
page.content: There is a variety of factor- ies in our area, large and small. The Caterpillar factory is one of the bigg- est under one roof in the country and makes earth-movers,some with large wh- eels some with tank-tracks. It has 1,500 workers but used to have many more. The Main Tool Co. makes precision tools to use in other factories. A smaller works does welding jobs. There is a large cement works with a rail line running into it where their wagons are loaded up. We also have a shoe factory and a place where wooden huts and garages are made. Nearby is a large industrial estate with mostly stores and works' offices. Many container-lorries come and go and there is also a transport depot with large vans.
